page.title: 11SHOPPING (continued)
page.content: The Post Office sells stationery items more than anything else apart from stamps.About 100 people a day come to the Post Office.The Fosters own the shop now and they came to the village from Fiji.The house behind the shop used to be a girls school 300 years ago, before we had a proper school. We have a mobile fish and chip van which comes once a week.You might say, "Fish and chips on wheels." Many things which people need cannot be bought in our village shops, and people have to go to towns like Wisbech or Peterborough to buy goods such as clothes,furniture and electrical goods.Some people travel by bus,but as there are not many buses,mostly people travel by car.
